quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
author: Helen Keller
facts: Helen Adams Keller was born on June 27, 1880 in Tuscumbia, Alabama, U.S. was an American author, political activist, and lecturer. She was the first deaf-blind person to earn a bachelor of arts degree. She was a prolific author who is known for the notable work, The Story of My Life.

quote: Everybody who is incapable of learning has taken to teaching
author: Oscar Wilde
facts: Oscar Fingal O'Flahertie Wills Wilde was born on October 16, 1854 in Dublin, Ireland.  He was an was an Irish poet and playwright. His notable works are The Importance of Being Earnest and The Picture of Dorian Gray

author: Susan B. Anthony
facts: Susan Anthony was born on February 15, 1820 in Adams, Massachusetts, U.S. She was an American social reformer and women's rights activist who played a pivotal role in the women's suffrage movement.
